# Packages for HTTP testing

**Learning objectives:**

- Describe the challenges of HTTP testing in R packages.
- Describe the basic functionality of the `{webmockr}` package.
- Describe the basic functionality of the `{vcr}` package.
- Describe the basic functionality of the `{httptest}` package.
- Describe the basic functionality of the `{httptest2}` package.
- Describe the basic functionality of the `{webfakes}` package.
